name: Susterra Ltd (UK)
slogan: Using data analytics to create sustainable businesses
description:
Susterra’s uniqueness lies in our granularly accurate software. From the start we’ve been
dedicated to getting this right. This level of deep dive accuracy enables analysis to be
quantifiable. This allows us to create science based carbon reduction strategies and targets for our clients taking into account optimised reductions in CO2e and cost.

We are industry leaders but are always looking for ways to stay at the cutting edge. Our clients expect the best from us so that is what we deliver. With our guidance and data analysis, we are able to create strategy to work towards a more sustainable economy.
